rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses tracking viral changes without high-potency language.
The segment describes future action ('We’re going to be tracking').
The segment does not contain explicit calming language or cues for reassurance.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a surveillance/monitoring activity ('We’re going to be tracking the virus to see is it changing').
